intro: The v-simple-table component is a simple wrapper component around the <table> element. Inside the component you can use all the regular table elements such as <thead>, <tbody>, <tr>, etc.

usage.heading: Usage
usage.intro: The simple table is a wrapper component around the <table> element.

dark.heading: Dark
dark.intro: Use dark prop to switch table to the dark theme.

dense.heading: Dense
dense.intro: You can show a dense version of the table by using the dense prop.

fixheader.heading: Fixed header
fixheader.intro: Use the fixed-header prop together with the height prop to fix the header to the top of the table.
